name: Beep or Treat!
description:
Knock knock knock, ring ring!
🚪 Beep or Treat! 🎃
Each darkened Halloween 🦇
On every mischief night with a Full Moon 🌕
The Creator will grab your candy to win 🍬 And feed them into his Beep goons... 💛

🧛 In this interactive mini game you play as "The Creator", the mastermind behind the living game consoles called Beeps. The Creator wants candy for Beep. That's why you'll have to Beep-or-Treat!

🧙‍♀️ The Witch has a spell that summons candy, but it will only work if you guess the right option each time she asks to.

☆ How to Play:☆
1. Tap (or Click) to start the game.
2. Tap into any object to interact with it.
3.Ring the doorbell or knock the door until it opens.
4. When each line of dialogue finishes, tap anywhere to continue.
5. Tap into buttons to select them. 6. HAVE FUN! 👻 <(•`w´•)>

✧ This is a fully Interactive Microgame best experienced on Desktop platforms. Taps on the screen work as clicks on mobile platforms.
 ✧ Original Concept, Game Development, Art, Animation and Sounds by @PlayfulChunks.
✧ Follow the project at @PlayfulChunks on Twitter.
✧ Thank you for playing, supporting and sharing our games made from passion! 💛
